title: Rule Hierarchy Cascade
description: An interactive visualization showing how rules cascade through 5 organizational hierarchy levels (Enterprise, Business Unit, Department, Project, Personal) and how conflicts are resolved using specificity principles.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Instructional Design
Configuration Management
Systems Architecture
learningObjectives: Explain how rules cascade through organizational hierarchies
Identify when a rule can and cannot be overridden
Predict how conflicts between levels are resolved
Apply the 'most specific wins' principle to configuration conflicts

controls.description: Hover over hierarchy levels and rule chips to see details
Click Animate Cascade button to visualize rule flow

assumptions: Most specific level wins conflict resolution
limitations: Does not show complex multi-path inheritance
